## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
BAS_YM <- format(Sys.Date(),'%Y%m')
print(BAS_YM)
sprintf("작업년월 : %s", BAS_YM)
```
